Posts.Content: May 19, 2012 10:28PM Krazycatlady37 wrote: Pamelahope: consider hats, cotton ones then. I've spoken to a few ladies that have dealt with hot and humid Indiana summers and they suggested cotton hats and cotton kerchief type "scarves. So I stocked up on those (hair should be gone by next weekend.) I ordered a bunch from acs's tlc store and found one hat at the Eddie Bauer store yesterday, which is totally my style.
Posts.Title: Question about chemo before surgery pamelahope kltb04
